entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , McCreary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: McCreary 2:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -19.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -26.5°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
